column5: Hi all,   Wanted to get out for trout and walleye, intended going to 2 new lakes but my buddy pulled out last minute so decided to stay local. First off went across Wabigoon to Thunder Lake for trout, then Thunder lake to Dore Lake for walleye.   Managed to get a small trout and a a couple of walleye and some cool footage of my journeys to and from the lakes.   Trout and walleye were finnicky that day......lots on screen.....just not lots of takers.                                     I headed out again today after another buddy pulled out from some renos we had planned......oh well. gave me time to build a snow fort with Jack and mess around in the snow before heading out to get a couple of hours in before supper.   Bite was almost non existent, but i had the whole lake to myself and it was just great being out.   I did forget my sign....AGAIN.......got inventive....lol.         SNOW FORTS ARE FUN                                                               ONLY GOT A SMALL PIKE TODAY........BUT THE SOLITUDE WAS AWESOME!              BEST TOURNEY SIGN EVER!
Nice! But that's no snow fort, here's mine (I was bored yesterday LOL)
Some nice looking Walleye you caught right there. Wish I was banging those.
where do i get the sign?
Awesome, as always Simon.  When are ya gonna start exploring the backwoods for SPECKLES????
Great pics Simon.  That's some kinda winter you're getting to enjoy.  Fine walleye too.
